<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/xrpc/com.atproto.sync.getHostStatus"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint is part of the atproto repository synchronization APIs. Requests usually do not require authentication, and can be made to PDS intances or Relay instances.*

*To learn more about calling atproto API endpoints like this one, see the [API Hosts and Auth](/docs/advanced-guides/api-directory) guide.*

Returns information about a specified upstream host, as consumed by the server. Implemented by relays.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"hostname","in":"query","description":"Hostname of the host (eg, PDS or relay) being queried.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","description":"Hostname of the host (eg, PDS or relay) being queried."}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["hostname"],"properties":{"hostname":{"type":"string"},"seq":{"type":"integer"},"accountCount":{"type":"integer"},"status":{"type":"string","enum":["active","idle","offline","throttled","banned"],"title":"com.atproto.sync.defs.hostStatus"}}}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad Request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["error","message"],"properties":{"error":{"type":"string","enum":["InvalidRequest","ExpiredToken","InvalidToken","HostNotFound"]},"message":{"type":"string"}}}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["error","message"],"properties":{"error":{"const":"AuthMissing"},"message":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}}
